file_content.text: Return to Voss-Ka. We will escort Jokull.
Jokull is dead. You must return to Voss-Ka.
Jokull still breathes. Finish him.
The commandos are in your hands. Hurry!
The Gormak's machines will destroy us. Shut them down.
Outsider. You are a welcome sight.
I led several squads here. We split up to cover ground.
The Gormak were waiting. We were ambushed.
A second ambush might finish us off. Any ideas?
We have to regroup.
Can you fight?
We will survive. Our victory is not certain.
Pfft. Amateurs.
You stand here because of my men.
Another squad made it farther inside. They reported security fields, weapons, Gormak traps. We lost contact.
The Gormak have many defenses. The assault will be difficult if they remain armed.
The Gormak do love their technology.
Disarming them won't be easy.
They are distracted. They hunt the other commandos--
You're in command here.
The machines can be shut down--
All the tech in Gorma-Koss won't stop me.
Shouldn't be a problem for me.
You do not fight alone, outsider--
Rade-Sa! The Gormak! We are captured! Send help--
The commandos will not escape without assistance.
They know the price of victory. You must strike now if we are to kill Jokull.
I won't let the Voss die down here.
I'll save the commandos.
You risk defeat.
The commandos are not far. I will tell them help is coming.
We'll reach Jokull, no matter the cost.
We'll attack the defenses.
We do what is necessary.
The control room is nearby. Destroy the machines inside. The defenses will fall.
We will continue the assault. Move quickly.
Jokull will die. The Gormak will fall.
